title: Why the marijuana and tobacco policy camps are on very different paths

title_detail.value: Why the marijuana and tobacco policy camps are on very different paths

summary: New research looked at diverging trajectories of cannabis and tobacco policies in the US and attempts to explain some of the reasoning behind the different paths, while discussing possible implications.

summary_detail.value: New research looked at diverging trajectories of cannabis and tobacco policies in the US and attempts to explain some of the reasoning behind the different paths, while discussing possible implications.
